A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Great movie\, one of the best of the franchise. I admit that there are a couple of awful scenes\, but the space battles are absolutely great\, the plot is good\, the acting is really good\, and the characters development is impeccable. The movie is obviously a turning point in the franchise and i understand who didn't like it\, but\, instead\, i loved it. A really fresh air breathe.
